issue.title: [C++] Add option to validate Flatbuffers messages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2222](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2222). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is follow up work to ARROW-1589, ARROW-2023, and can be validated by the `ipc-fuzzer-test`. Users receiving untrusted input streams can prevent segfaults this way

As part of this, we should quantify the overhead associated with message validation in regular use
